name: AuthInterceptor
desc: Interceptor for handling authentication in GraphQL requests

name: authHeaderKey
desc: Header key for authorization

name: autoRetryWithRefreshedToken
desc: Whether to automatically retry failed requests with refreshed token

name: getToken
desc: Function to get the current authentication token

name: maxAuthRetries
desc: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed auth

name: onAuthenticationError
desc: Function to handle authentication errors

name: onError
desc: Called when an exception was occurred during the request.

name: onRequest
desc: Called when the request is about to be sent.

name: onResponse
desc: Called when the response is about to be resolved.

name: refreshToken
desc: Function to refresh the token when expired

name: tokenType
desc: Token type (e.g., 'Bearer', 'Basic')

name: BatchOperation
desc: Represents a single operation in a batch request

name: BatchOperation.fromJson
desc: Creates a BatchOperation from a JSON map

name: cachePolicy
desc: Cache policy for this specific operation

name: operationName
desc: Name of the operation for tracking

name: query
desc: The GraphQL query/mutation string

name: toJson
desc: Converts the operation to a JSON map

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ttl
desc: Time to live for cached response

name: variables
desc: Variables for the operation

name: BatchResponse
desc: Represents a response from a batched GraphQL operation

name: allErrorMessages
desc: Gets all error messages from all operations that had errors

name: failedResponses
desc: Gets all failed responses (those with errors)

name: getResponse
desc: Gets the response at the specified index with type safety

name: hasErrors
desc: Whether any of the operations in the batch resulted in errors

name: isCompletelySuccessful
desc: Whether all operations in the batch were successful

name: length
desc: Number of operations in the batch

name: responses
desc: List of individual responses for each operation in the batch

name: successfulResponses
desc: Gets all successful responses (those without errors)

name: BatchResponseExtension
desc: Extension methods for working with batch responses

name: getSuccessfulData
desc: Gets successful responses of a specific type

name: mapResponses
desc: Maps responses to a specific type

name: CacheKeyGenerator
desc: Type definition for cache key generator

name: CacheManager
desc:
A cache manager that handles both in-memory and persistent storage caching
for GraphQL responses with features like TTL, compression, and encryption.

name: CachePolicy
desc: Defines the caching behavior for GraphQL operations

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: CachePolicyExtension
desc: Extension methods for CachePolicy

name: canReadFromCache
desc: Whether this policy allows reading from cache

name: canWriteToCache
desc: Whether this policy allows writing to cache

name: defaultTtl
desc: Default TTL (Time To Live) for this cache policy

name: requiresNetwork
desc: Whether this policy requires network access

name: retentionPriority
desc:
Priority level for cache invalidation
Higher number means higher priority for keeping in cache

name: supportsBackgroundRefresh
desc: Whether this policy supports background refresh

name: CacheUpdater
desc: Type definition for a function that handles cache updates

name: ConnectionStatusHandler
desc: Type definition for WebSocket connection status handler

name: ErrorHandler
desc: Type definition for a function that handles GraphQL errors

name: ErrorHandlingStrategy
desc: Defines how errors should be handled in the GraphQL client

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

desc: Creates a new GraphQLClient instance

desc: Gets the number of active subscriptions

desc: Executes multiple GraphQL operations in batch

desc: Clears the cache

desc: Disposes of client resources

desc: Gets cache statistics

desc: Gets the GraphQL schema

desc: Checks if subscriptions are supported

desc: Invalidates specific queries in the cache

desc: Executes a mutation and invalidates cache entries

name: queryCacheFirst

desc: Creates a configuration optimized for development use

name: GraphQLConfig.production
desc: Creates a configuration optimized for production use

name: autoRefreshAuth
desc: Whether to automatically handle authentication refresh

name: copyWith
desc: Creates a copy of this config with the given fields replaced with new values

name: defaultCachePolicy
desc: Default caching policy for queries

name: defaultCacheTtl
desc: Duration after which cached entries are considered stale

name: defaultHeaders
desc: Default headers to be sent with every request

name: defaultTimeout
desc: Default timeout duration for requests

name: enableCompression
desc: Whether to enable compression for cached data

name: enableLogging
desc: Whether to enable request/response logging

name: enableQueryComplexityAnalysis
desc: Whether to include query complexity analysis

desc: Error handling strategy

name: includeOperationName
desc: Whether to include operation name in requests

name: maxCacheSize
desc: Maximum size for the in-memory cache (in bytes)

desc: Maximum allowed query complexity score

name: retryDelay
desc: Delay between retry attempts

desc: A string representation of this object.

desc: The path to the response field that encountered the error

desc: Converts the error to a JSON map

name: Location
desc: Represents a location in a GraphQL document where an error occurred

desc: Creates a new Location instance

desc: Creates a Location from a JSON map

name: column
desc: The column number in the GraphQL document (1-based)

desc: Compares two locations for ordering

desc: Creates a copy of this location with the given fields replaced with new values

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: isAfter
desc: Whether this location comes after another location in the document

desc: Whether this location comes before another location in the document

desc: The line number in the GraphQL document (1-based)

desc: The equality operator.

desc: Converts the location to a JSON map

desc: Returns a string representation of the location in the format "line:column"

desc: A string representation of this object.

desc: Gets the earliest location in the list
